name: pwd
description: Print the name of the current working directory.

options.description: print the value of $PWD if it names the current working directory
print the physical directory, without any symbolic links

tldr:
> Print name of current/working directory.
> More information: <https://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/pwd>.

- Print the current directory:

`pwd`

- Print the current directory, and resolve all symlinks (i.e. show the "physical" path):

`pwd -P`
